name: Connaught Place (CP)
description: Iconic circular market with high-end brands, restaurants, and street shops.

name: Sarojini Nagar Market
description: Famous for budget-friendly fashion, export surplus items, and bargain hunting.

name: Dilli Haat
description: Open-air craft bazaar with stalls from various Indian states, offering food and handicrafts.

name: Chandni Chowk
description: Historic and bustling market, a must-visit for wholesale goods, spices, and traditional wear.
